pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geostatistical Modelling with Likelihood and Bayes // Geostatistical modelling facilities using 'SpatRaster' and 'SpatVector' objects are provided. Non-Gaussian models are fit using 'INLA', and Gaussian geostatistical models use Maximum Likelihood Estimation. For details see Brown (2015) doi:10.18637/jss.v063.i12. The 'RandomFields' package is available at https://www.wim.uni- mannheim.de/schlather/publications/software.
